title: Infiniti Pro by Conair Curl Innovation Curling Iron with Rotating Clamp
description: The infiniti pro by Conair curl evolution curling iron with rotating clip has a 1-inch tourmaline ceramic barrel. Tourmaline technology helps the hair cuticle lie flat for luminous shine and soft, frizz-free, manageable hair. Ceramic technology creates higher, evenly distributed heat that penetrates the hair fast and adds smoothness in seconds! It also features 400 degrees Fahrenheit high heat with 30-second instant heat option; also includes professional swivel cord and auto shutoff.  Clamp holds hair and spins around to create the perfect curl.
